Calculate the Radius of an Ice Cream Cone (Apply Function)

cone_radius_apply.Rd

Computes the radius of an ice cream cone for a given vector of heights using the sapply function. This implementation applies a custom function to each element in the vector using base R's sapply.

Usage

cone_radius_apply(x)

Arguments

x

A numeric vector representing the heights of the cone.

Value

A numeric vector representing the radius of the cone at the specified heights. Returns 0 for heights outside the valid range.

Examples

# Example usage
cone_radius_apply(c(-1, 5, 8.5, 9.5, 12))  # Returns radii for a vector of heights
#> [1] 0.000000 0.625000 1.719138 2.496242 0.000000
